subject: Soccer
Gambling
Ethics
lead_paragraph: A German soccer player explains how he nearly fixed his soccer matches. As many as 200 matches are under scrutiny, 32 of them in Germany, including the Osnabrück-Augsburg clash on April 17.
snippet: A German soccer player explains how he nearly fixed his soccer matches. As many as 200 matches are under scrutiny, 32 of them in Germany, including the Osnabrück-Augsburg clash on April 17.
